headline: Walke says React become a trend
description: React has become trend nowadays and we have to answer our developers' need carefully.
author: Jorwin Lake

headline: Picsai says Angular.js popularity dropped
description: Angular.js popularity dropped because of recent developments in ES6 and we could not adapt.
author: Tendar Picsai

headline: Microsoft will now support ES6 in Internet Explorer 13
description: Due to recent developments in Front-End Technology, we are happy to announce that Internet Explorer 13 will support ES6.
author: Bill Tongs

headline: ES8 is on air
description: Ecma International announced ES8 at 5:00 pm(North Pacific Time).
author: General Assembly, Ecma Interntional
